text: Postural asphyxia, also known as "positional asphyxia", is a form of asphyxia which occurs when a person is positioned in a way that restricts or prevents breathing. == References == * Fundaci√≥n MAPFRE. "Positional asphyxia in babies: What is it and how to avoid it?". https://www.fundacionmapfre.org/en/blog/positional-asphyxia/. Retrieved 25 May 2025.
title: Postural asphyxia
